Title: Taking the new Chromium WebView2 Control for a Spin in .NET - Part 1
Description: This is Part 1 of a two part article that gives an overview of the new WebView2 Web browser control that is based on Edge Chromium. In Part 1 I look at the basics of what's needed to run the control using the WebView runtime, and how to get the control embedded and configured to use for basic HTML tasks. In Part 2 I look at interaction between the .NET application and WebBrowser and Javascript.

Title: Pauline Hanson’s website domain has been snapped up and redirected
Description: RUMOUR CONFIRMED Those looking for One Nation senator Pauline Hanson’s website may be surprised by what they find. Ms Hanson’s website domain has expired, and it’s been snapped up by someone else. PaulineHanson.com.au now redirects to the Refugee Council of Australia website.
